name: Gran Trak F1 Edition
description:
Gran Trak 2 now has a new look, in the form of Gran Trak F1 Edition!  Just like the last game, use the arrow keys to drive the car, and complete as many laps as you can before the time runs out.  This time however, you will now be able to select your favorite Formula 1 team to go racing with!

No copyright infringement is intended by the use of real life F1 team logos.
